name: Description
description: Description of the content of the document

name: Modality
description: The form in which the document is presented (written or spoken)

name: Genre
description: The category or type of the document

name: Domain
description: The subject or field to which the document belongs

name: Term
description: Individual word forms in the document

name: Lemma
description: Base or dictionary form of the term

name: Part of Speech
description: Grammatical category of the term (modified PENN Treebank tagset)
